history_of_seizures.description: Does the applicant have any history of seizures?; Checkboxes on the form.

seizure_activity_past_5_years.description: Has the applicant had any seizure activity in the past 5 years?; Checkboxes on the form.

seizure_control_with_medication.description: Are the seizures currently being controlled with medication?; Checkboxes on the form.

seizure_frequency.description: How frequently the applicant has seizures (times per day, week, month, or year)?

seizure_duration_before_intervention.description: How long can a seizure last before medical intervention becomes necessary?

antecedents_to_seizure.description: Describe any antecedents to a seizure:

post_seizure_behavior_changes.description: Is there any noticeable changes in behavior after a seizure (e.g. groggy, confused, irritable, etc)?

typical_seizure_presentation.description: How does a seizure typically present itself? Please describe the physical characteristics, and the typical duration:

emergency_medical_interventions.description: Describe medical interventions that are appropriate and available in an emergency (nerve stimulator, medication, length of seizure before calling paramedics, etc.).

other_seizure_info.description: Please discuss any other information relating to seizures that is important for the individual's safety?
